code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000/api/users';export const sendOTP=async data=>{try{const response=await axios.post(`${API_URL}/sendOTP`,data);return response.data;}catch(error){throw error;}};export const verifyTransaction=async data=>{try{const response=await axios.post(`${API_URL}/verifyTransaction`,data);return response.data;}catch(error){throw error;}};
